title: Israel's genocide in Gaza has orphaned over 20,000 children

author: MuslimDude37
text: Why would that man just interview the girl when she's carrying her sister and getting tired? Help her first and talk to her later. I feel so sorry for the children of Palestine, their only joy being things like warmth and food which we take for granted everyday. Insha'Allah they will be freed.

author: ChatterMaxx
text:
Btw, the cameraman got these sisters in a car and drove them to a hospital.

https://www.instagram.com/reel/DBYzj1FqeFq/

The cameraman is a Palestinian who himself is a victim of Israelâ€™s occupation and genocide while also drawing attention to the suffering of millions more who are suffering in silence and with no one in the world willing to stand up for them including yourself who immediately resorted to making disparaging comments online.

He goes on to get this girl help but instead we have Muslims stuffing their faces with Samosas this Ramadan and making idiotic comments online about our brothers and sisters in Palestine.

Shame on this Ummah for letting this happen and doing nothing more than passing judgmental comments online.
